short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the front page of The Hindu ePaper on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your new tab experience with The Hindu ePaper Front Page extension. Each time you open a new tab, this extension displays the latest front page of The Hindu ePaper.

Why You Should Install This Extension:

1. See the Latest Headlines: View the front page of The Hindu ePaper directly in your new tab.

2. Easy Navigation: Click on the front page image to be redirected to The Hindu ePaper website, where you can read the entire newspaper.

3. Stay Informed: Keep up with the latest news effortlessly and easily access the full ePaper.

Make your browsing experience more informative with The Hindu ePaper Front Page extension!
